At the Ocean Drive Beach Resort

about us

Our preferred location is a parcel with land size of beach. Currently we have available a total of twelve (12) rooms out of which we have three (3) executive suites, with jacuzzi tubs, each room has individual climate control, direct-dial phones, and televisions. The facility has a large main lobby area, indoor pool/Jacuzzi sauna, table tennis and snooker, basketball court, soccer pitch, cigar bar, ample parking, and all equipment necessary for operation of the hotel. We have a separate onsite VIP and VVIP sitting facility and complex meeting room available to serve you along with our unique children play ground and a restaurant; with our future lounge/grill space. The grounds are beautifully landscaped. The 12-unit guest house includes a lobby with a reception area, storage area, laundry room, bathroom, meeting rooms, a balcony, a men's and women's bathroom, kitchen, an outdoor swimming pool, and shisha bar. The hotel has a partial basement and includes a laundry room with two washers and two dryers. The Execute Night Club (future cigar bar and basement bar/meeting room area) The exterior is cedar and the roof is pitch and pebble. The building is seated on a poured concrete and a concrete block foundation. Interior walls are concrete block and drywall. The flooring is carpet and ceramic tile. There are casement windows and wood storms and screens.
